sentences.en: As one of the critical steps, identification of risk factors affects the sequent risk evaluation directly.
sentences.cn: 摘要风险因素辨识作为风险评价的关键环节之一, 其结果直接影响后续的风险评价.

sentences.en: Chinese four - character structure like a chain of pearls has meaning with rich andand its sequent tone.
sentences.cn: 连珠四字结构词义丰富,文采华丽,语气连贯,而其字面意义却并非历历俱足,往往是虚实相生,重在一股气势和意境.

sentences.en: In the sequent ten years, he travelled almost the whole country.
sentences.cn: 在接下来的十年里他差不多走遍了整个国家。

sentences.en: It is a dynamic circular chain that formed by sequent lists and linked lists alternately.
sentences.cn: 该结构是由顺序表与链表交叉构造而形成的一种动态循环链表.

sentences.en: Methods Adopt the sequent nursing procedure to implement the holistic nursing.
sentences.cn: 运用护理程序对患者实施整体护理.

sentences.en: The ultrasonic pulse sent is controlled by CPU, The ultrasonic pulse can be sequent and discontinuous.
sentences.cn: 脉冲的发射由CPU控制, 可以发送连续超声波和序列脉冲波.

sentences.en: The warming of the Earth and the con-sequent climatic changes affect us all.
sentences.cn: 地球变暖以及随之而来的气候变化影响着我们所有人。
